extension.name: Membership Card Designer
extension.description: Advanced membership card designer with drag-and-drop functionality, token support, and photo integration. Create professional membership cards with customizable templates.
extension.comments:
This extension provides a comprehensive membership card designer that allows organizations to: - Create custom membership card templates with drag-and-drop interface - Use tokens for dynamic content (contact info, membership details, organization data) - Support for photos and images - QR codes and barcodes for verification - Professional card layouts similar to Wild Apricot - Bulk card generation for memberships - Card verification system - Export cards as PNG/PDF
Features: - Visual template designer with Fabric.js - Token-based dynamic content - Photo upload and positioning - Multiple card sizes and backgrounds - Grid snapping and alignment tools - Layer management - Preview functionality - Responsive design - Print-ready output
